titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the better furnishing of the nauy, and increase of shipping.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at His Maiesties Court at White-Hall, the foure and twentieth day of Aprill, in the second yeere of His Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Sociery of Antiquaries.
